Series.Actors: |Rachel Nichols|Victor Webster|Erik Knudsen|Hugh Dillon|Magda Apanowicz|Nicholas Lea|William B. Davis|Tahmoh Penikett|John Cassini|Luvia Petersen|Omari Newton|Tony Amendola|Roger R. Cross|John Reardon|Richard Harmon|Stephen Lobo|Brian Markinson|Lexa Doig|Jennifer Spence|
Series.Overview: Kiera Cameron (Rachel Nichols), a Vancouver City Protective Services officer, is transported from the year 2077 to 2012 when eight ruthless terrorists, known as Liber8, attempt to escape execution through time travel. With the help of 17 year old tech genius Alec Sadler (Erik Knudsen) and VPD officer Carlos Fonnegra (Victor Webster), Kiera must survive in our time period, and capture Liber8 before they can alter the course of history and change the future.
